title: Episode 478 - DB Sports Companion Show - Special Guest Benny The Ticket Guru
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Benny Daniel from Tickets2allonline.com to discuss how to get the cheapest prices to all your favorite teams at 214-396-3501 including this weekend's Georgia/Notre Dame matchup.  Ross and Dan al...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Benny Daniel from Tickets2allonline.com to discuss how to get the cheapest prices to all your favorite teams at 214-396-3501 including this weekend's Georgia/Notre Dame matchup.  Ross and Dan also breakdown one of the craziest week's in NFL history, as well as their dominance last weekend in the NFL and College spreads and why you should watch out for this upcoming "Trap Weekend" gambling wise.
